name: Beyond R: Rule Ripper (Demo)
description:
Welcome to the Golden Jack

A death game of 10 rules assigned to each of the 10 players, a mysterious bar, and 10 hours to live. You can only disobey your own rule. If you die, your rule is removed from the game, until only 3 remain. An evolving game that changes with every death.

But he won’t allow it.

Refusing to play into the hands of his kidnapper, one player challenges the game itself. 

Search for what’s beyond and overcome the system, or be eaten by it. But don’t forget...that you are no hero.

  • A death game visual novel where your main goal isn’t to win, survive, or find the truth, but to defy the game itself, the fate that you’ve been given.
  • Ten characters, each hiding one of the rules of the game alongside their pasts. Only by learning more about them will you uncover their rules and understand them as people, but will you pity them or...?
  • Search for clues hidden throughout the Golden Jack bar, complete your hourly objectives, and face the other players at the end of each hour in the Council, where tragedy lurks behind each word and your survival depends on where you decide to intervene and what to say.
  • More than 20 different endings to explore, with several paths to take.

This is a demo for a game in development, with a Kickstarter coming Early 2023. Not all assets are finalized and some are subject to change.
